titleStmt.title: A path way i[n]to the holy scripture
titleStmt.author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Leaf A2r last line: "oure". This may be the later edition. Reprinted from the prologue of Tyndale's translation of the New Testament (STC 2823)--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge) Library.
